00515 /*  ========================================================================
00516     BootState
00517     ======================================================================== */
00518 
00522 class BootState
00523 {
00524     public:
00525         enum {
00526             NO_PROVIDERS = c_end_provider_range - c_start_provider_range,
00527             BITS_PER_UINT = sizeof(UINT) * 8,
00528             BITFIELDSIZE = (((NO_PROVIDERS*2) + BITS_PER_UINT - 1) / BITS_PER_UINT) * BITS_PER_UINT,
00529         };
00530 
00531         BootState();
00532         ~BootState();
00533 
00535         BOOLEAN IsUpdated(INT providerid) const;
00537         BOOLEAN IsAvailable(INT providerid) const;
00538 
00540         void SetUpdated(INT providerid); 
00542         void SetAvailable(INT providerid);
00543 
00544 #if defined(_DEBUG)
00545         void DumpStates();
00546 #endif
00547 
00548     private:
00549         // first NO_PROVIDERS describes IsLoaded, next NO_PROVIDERS describes IsAvailable 
00550         BitVector<BITFIELDSIZE> m_bitvector;
00551 };
00552

00554     BootControl
00555     ======================================================================== */
00556 
00560 class BootControl
00561 {
00562     public:
00563         friend class SmsLoadingFinishedCondition;
00564 
00565         BootControl();
00566         ~BootControl();
00567         enum {
00568             NO_PROVIDERS = c_end_provider_range - c_start_provider_range,
00569         };
00570 
00571 
00572         // is called from Asc/BootHandler
00573         void RequestOnStartup(INT providerid, BootNotification notification);
00574 
00575         // is called from Asc/BootDispatcher
00576         void StartLoading();
00577         
00578         // is called from Asc/BootDispatcher
00579         void OnFinishedSmsLoading();
00580 
00581         // is called from handlers and providers
00582         void SendDataControlBootProgressMsg(INT providerid, INT progress);
00583 
00584         // is called after a Sim init is received
00585         void DisableLoading() { m_allowed = FALSE; }
00586 
00587         // is called after a Sim full access is received
00588         void EnableLoading() { m_allowed = TRUE; }
00589 
00590         // checks if loading is allowed
00591         BOOLEAN IsLoadingAllowed() { return m_allowed; }
00592 
00593     private:
00594         BootNotification GetBootNotification(INT providerid);
00595         BOOLEAN ShallBeLoaded(INT providerid);
00596         void UpdateProvider(INT providerid);
00597         void SendDataControlBootMsg();
00598 
00599         UINT8 m_provider_control[NO_PROVIDERS];
00600 
00601         BootState m_bootstate;
00602         BOOLEAN   m_smsloaded;
00603         BOOLEAN   m_allowed;
00604 };
